projectName: Baltic Cruiser Marine Protection & Coating Package
caption:
Baltic Performance Cruiser | Advanced Marine Protection by VRS

Just completed a multi day detailing project on this high performance Baltic Cruiser, focusing on full surface protection and long term resilience in harsh marine conditions.

We began with full fiberglass correction: hull, boom, and mast to remove oxidation, restore clarity, and prep the surfaces for coating. Once fully polished, we applied System X Extreme, a high end ceramic marine coating engineered for maximum protection against salt corrosion, UV degradation, acids, alkalis, exhaust fallout, and marine bio contaminants.

Perspex deck windows and the large forward panoramic screen were also machine polished and sealed, restoring optical clarity and protecting against surface pitting and UV hazing. Interior surfaces received precision detailing and were protected where applicable to maintain the yacht's luxury finishes.

With System X Extreme now bonded to every key surface, this vessel is ready for extended time on the water with deep gloss, low maintenance, and long lasting defense.

#VRSdetailing #SystemXExtreme #YachtDetailing #MarineCoating #CeramicCoating #FiberglassCorrection #UVProtection #SaltResistance #BoatDetailingUK #LuxuryYachtCare #PerformanceCruiser #vrsspecialists #DetailingProfessionals #brightonmarina

projectName: Full Cabin Decontamination with Seat Removal
caption:
ğŸš—Unveiling the epitome of automotive care â€“ VRS Deep Interior Detail. A meticulous day-long journey to revive every inch of your vehicle's interior.

ğŸ’ºSeats gracefully removed, subjected to wet extraction cleaning, and delicately infrared dried. Our arsenal includes bacterial-killing, odor-absorbing products, hot steam, and precision air tools.

ğŸ› ï¸ The finale? A shield of anti-bacterial, anti-static, and hydrophobic coatings, meticulously applied to leathers, fabrics, door card compartments, and vinyls.

ğŸŒŸElevate your driving experience with unparalleled cleanliness and comfort.

#VRSInteriorDetail #AutomotiveCare #LuxuryDriven #deepclean #vrsspecialists

ğŸš—ğŸ”§Wr are thrilled to announce our next project at VRS - Vehicle Rejuvenation Specialists, ğŸš€where we have brought a Jaguar F type R V8 back to its pristine glory in just a week.ğŸ’ª

This restoration journey began with a comprehensive 3-stage decontamination wash, tar removal, iron removal, and clay bar treatment. We gave meticulous attention to the wheel, wheel arches, and door shuts, ensuring no detail was overlooked.ğŸ§¼âœ¨

ğŸŒªï¸ğŸ’¦ Our team followed this up by steam cleaning the engine bay, and then applying a protective layer of ceramic coating. The journey continued with a 2-stage paint correction starting from the coarse stage (5,3, and 1 inch polishers), and culminating in the fine stage.ğŸ¨âœ¨

Bodywork, headlights, backlights, and chromes weren't left behind; these were polished and then coated with the exclusive Onyx 10H & 1N Graphene Pro Ceramic Coating - available only to certified detailers. This included application on plastics and rubbers too.ğŸ›¡ï¸ğŸ”’

The interior received an equally rigorous treatment - full vacuum, air dusting, wet extraction vacuuming, followed by an anti-bacterial and anti-abrasion hydrophobic coating applied to the leathers, plastics, and fabrics. ğŸ§¼ğŸ›‹ï¸

At VRS, we are committed to excellence and precision, because we understand that every vehicle tells a story. Stay tuned to witness the results!

ğŸ’« Fully Insured and Certified Detailer. Gtechniq (TSP), Onyx Coating & Kamikaze Collection Applicator with IDA (International Detailing Association) - Skills Validated Certificate, RUPES Specialist Certification & UPPF Paint Protection Film Installer

Experience transformation like never before. Today, a majestic Range Rover Sport graced our studio, receiving the ultimate detailing treatments. Every curve and corner of its robust frame underwent a meticulous deep cleanse, eliminating all contaminants. Our skilled technicians then enhanced its grandeur with precision machine polishing techniques, revealing a paintwork that's not just clean, but truly revitalized.

But we didn't stop there. To ensure this Range Rover Sport continues to turn heads and command the roads, we sealed its renewed splendor with a top-tier ceramic coatingâ€”exclusive to our certified detailing sanctuary. The wheels and glass didn't just get a touch-up; they were pampered with specialized coatings for that extra shield against the elements.

Inside, we brought luxury back to life, detailing every inch of the interior and applying premium coatings for a lasting, pristine look. And for the grand finale, the brake calipers were meticulously painted in the original vibrant red, adorned with crisp white RR decals, and finished with a protective lacquer, ensuring every detail shines with excellence.

Witness the extraordinary. This Range Rover Sport is not just detailedâ€”it's redefined. #RangeRoverSport #DetailingExcellence #CeramicCoating #LuxuryCarCare #vrsspecialists

projectName: Rolls Royce Phantom Surface Refinement & Gloss Enhancement
caption:
Rolls-Royce Phantom from @straffordcars in for VRS SiC Protection

There's something truly special about a Rolls Royce Phantom - it's more than just a car, it's a statement of craftsmanship, presence, and timeless luxury. Having one in our studio is always an experience, and we treat it with the respect it deserves.

This Phantom received our VRS SiC application, a temporary spray coating that delivers stunning gloss, incredible slickness, and top-tier hydrophobic protection. Even short-term protection should meet the highest standards, and that's exactly what we deliver, because a car like this deserves nothing less.

Seeing the transformation never gets old. This is why we do what we do.

ğŸ“If you want your car to look its absolute best, you know where to find us.

#RollsRoyce #Phantom #VRSdetailing #SprayCoating #LuxuryDetailing #CarDetailing #PaintProtection #vrsspecialists #straffordcars
